# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your daily life or work efficiency. Given its unique features and benefits, I estimate its value to be significantly higher than $120. However, to make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you at an introductory price of $150. This special offer includes a 30-day satisfaction guarantee, during which you can return the product if it doesn't meet your expectations. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the full potential of our product. Let me know if you have any questions or need more information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
